Reviews.Title: “Seriously Dangerous”
Reviews.Author: DonbonUK
Reviews.Content: ok booked 5 nights business traveller couldnt tolerate 1 night hotel moved hotel day single ground floor inspection entire looked dirty tatty wallpaper ripped desk wardrobe toilet shower bed disgusting dust apparent asthmatic sufferer choked wipedown didnt running hot water shower discovered bedsheets pillows changed strands hair bed covers marks stains pillows evidence hotel doesnt care wellbeing guests worse completely safety hazard smoke alarms werent active alarm cover batteries installed extension wires torn revealing internal wiring alarming sight electrical wall sockets cracked wide internal wires springs child touch top walls windows thin hear noises guests probably awoken underground tube told reception desk wasnt happy move didnt bother unhappy shrugged head refunds ive stayed 15 hotels london seriously hotel called shut

Reviews.Title: “Don't do it...”
Reviews.Author: TarheelFamily_001
Reviews.Content: travel lot im cheap stay low takes cake stay desperate homeless tube tracks trains stopped running 3am night thank goodness stayed wekend stopped running midnight free breakfast hope corn flakes toast third shabby doesnt begin describe didnt beyond wrecking ball hostels amsterdam nicer stayed century hostel street train tracks nicer fourth security hefty forced door okit close tube staff isnt rude indifferent wouldnt recommend hotel friend enemy boss didnt terrible rating poor cant imagine worse western world maybe desert

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I can remember ever having stayed in the UK”
Reviews.Author: JABG_10
Reviews.Content: nice people filthy toilet broken lighting didnt dining facilities dirty breakfast slices cheap white toasted bread cup tea thorough refurbishment pervading cigarette smoke worry getting alive fire fire doors propped signs fire escape

Reviews.Title: “A terrible experience”
Reviews.Author: funtravel15
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel uk holiday bad experience jet lag looking forward sleep hard sleep train noise loud goes night ear plugs hotel central location hotel dirty repair lot dust walls dirty bathroom clean staff helpful staff helpful times rude breakfast basic stay 7 nights prebooked paid hotel night sleep people breakfast looked exhausted morning dont people sleep counting days till leave hotel unfortunately feel mad

Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL EVER!!!”
Reviews.Author: blekh1
Reviews.Content: ok start firstly checked website ok reviews posted capture horrible hotel actually arrived booked wrong luggage stairs 3 stories correct stairs death trap loose children dont sugest staying smelled hadnt bad asthmatics theres layers layers dust wall sockets windows bed dusty theres stains walls wall paper overall tacky presentation bathrooms covered mould loose broken tiles hot water kept day wifi bad beds broken ache morning actual manage sleep train garden literally runs 2 mins stop 12am ish start 4am beds smelt horrible tv crap recption bad breakfast hotel bargain stay life depended hotel cheap dont minimal standards plenty hotels road checked day trying money stayed hotels cross street dont mind getting sleep equivalent cardboard box shelter green court hotel
